name: Sourdough Bombolini

variants.name: Sourdough Bombolini
variants.description: Sourdough fluffy Bombolini with a crispy sugar crust

variants.name: Sourdough Bombolini Chocolate
variants.description: Sourdough fluffy Bombolini filled with dark chocolate
Sourdough fluffy Bombolini filled with homemade Bavarian cream
variants.name: Sourdough Bombolini Bavarian cream

attributes.title: Ingredients
attributes.details: Organic white flour, butter, milk, brown sugar, salt, free-range eggs, and young sourdough starter. Filling options are made of Bavarian cream and Italian 60% chocolate-hazelnut spread

attributes.title: Allergy Info
attributes.details: This product contains wheat, gluten, milk, and eggs. It may also contain traces of nuts.

attributes.title: Shelf-life and Storage
attributes.details: Enjoy at cold or at room temperature | Keep at room temperature for up to 2 days | For long-term storage, place in zip-lock bags and keep in the freezer for up to 3 months | Pastries should not be refrigerated | To serve from freezer, allow pastry to thaw at room temp.

attributes.title: Delivery
attributes.details: Sourdough bakery delivers Monday through Saturday of each week upon pre-order with ETA of 2 working days.

description: Our special sourdough version of Bombolini doughnuts, fried in avocado oil, these doughnuts are fluffy with a crispy sugar crust
